# The manual way to set the effect-size plot

```{r}
TOSTmeta(ES = 0.07, 
se =  0.0918,
low_eqbound_d = -0.2,
high_eqbound_d = 0.2)
```
```{r}
PA <- read.xlsx("E:/OneDrive - 東京都公立大学法人/Desktop/2019_TMU_Biostatistics/2019_TMU_Biostatistics/spheroid_onlyPA_glass.xlsx", sheetIndex = 1)
```


```{r}
glmmdrug <- glmer(day5Ratio ~ factor(CulturedDate)+factor(TypeI_collagen_μl)+factor(Material)+(1|Spheroid), data = PA, family=Gamma(link = "log"), nAGQ = 20)
summary(glmmdrug)
```

```{r}
plot_model(glmmdrug)
```
